<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105144</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105144</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205605</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Native Americans and Jamestown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gebürtige Amerikaner und Jamestown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Américains indigènes et Jamestown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Americanos nativos e Jamestown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Americani natali e Jamestown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγγενείς Αμερικανοί και Jamestown</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Americanos nativos y Jamestown</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using primary sources, students will investigate the role of Native Americans in the successes and failures of Jamestown. Students will identify and analyze inaccurate portrayals of Pocahontas and Powhatan by comparing historical facts with literary fiction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit Primärquellen forschen Kursteilnehmer die 
Rolle der gebürtigen Amerikaner in den Erfolgen und in den Ausfällen
von Jamestown nach. Kursteilnehmer kennzeichnen und analysieren 
ungenaue Schilderungen von Pocahontas und von Powhatan, indem sie 
historische Tatsachen mit literarischer Erfindung vergleichen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant des sources primaires, les étudiants
étudieront le rôle des Américains indigènes dans les succès et 
les pannes de Jamestown. Les étudiants identifieront et 
analyseront les représentations imprécises de Pocahontas et de 
Powhatan en comparant des faits historiques à la fiction littéraire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando fontes preliminares, os estudantes 
investigarão o papel de americanos nativos nos sucessos e nas falhas 
de Jamestown. Os estudantes identificarão e analisarão 
portrayals inaccurate de Pocahontas e de Powhatan comparando fatos 
históricos com o fiction literário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le sorgenti primarie, gli allievi 
studieranno il ruolo degli Americani natali nei successi e nei guasti 
di Jamestown. Gli allievi identificheranno ed analizzeranno le 
rappresentazioni inesatte di Pocahontas e di Powhatan paragonando i 
fatti storici al romanzo letterario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας τις αρχικές πηγές, οι σπουδαστές θα 
ερευνήσουν το ρόλο εγγενών Αμερικανών στις επιτυχίες και τις 
αποτυχίες Jamestown. Οι σπουδαστές θα προσδιορίσουν και θα
αναλύσουν τις ανακριβείς απεικονίσεις Pocahontas και Powhatan
με τη σύγκριση των ιστορικών γεγονότων με τη λογοτεχνική 
μυθιστοριογραφία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando fuentes primarias, los estudiantes 
investigarán el papel de americanos nativos en los éxitos y los 
incidentes de Jamestown. Los estudiantes identificarán y 
analizarán representaciones inexactas de Pocahontas y de Powhatan 
comparando hechos históricos con la ficción literaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
